title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 791.8 - Determination of public need
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 791.8 - Determination of public need

State Regulations

The factors and methodology for determining public need
with respect to a hospice construction application shall, as applicable, include, but need not be limited to, the criteria and methodology set forth in
section
790.16
of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
791.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
